name: City Hall
relation: Council meetings (MEE-401, MEE-402), official announcements for initiatives (INIT-101, INIT-102)
Public record repository, clerk’s office for building permits

name: County Office - Economic Development
relation: Meetings on small business grants (MEE-403), initiative INIT-103
Gina Rossi’s involvement (RES-202) in job creation
metadata: Focus on business licensing, startup incentives

name: Transit Authority HQ
relation: Council meeting MEE-404 about bus expansions (INIT-104)
Permits or vendor licenses for public transit (PL-304)
metadata: Transport planning, route scheduling, open public forum monthly

name: Health & Human Services Building
metadata: Service programs for low-income residents, mental health support

name: City Warehouse & Maintenance Yard
relation: Public projects equipment storage (PROJ-501 to PROJ-504)
Road or building materials for city improvements
metadata: Managed by Public Works Dept, restricted access
